Description:
Magnificent mountain views!
Just one look at the abundant natural light that blesses this stylish residence and you'll want to make it yours. Featuring polished hardwood floors, contemporary neutral décor, and fabulous views to Mt Dandenong, accommodation includes a light and airy open plan kitchen/dining/living zone, quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances, sleek white cabinetry, excellent storage, and garden aspect, 3 double bedrooms with robes (main with walk-in robe and ensuite), family bathroom, downstairs powder room, and full size laundry with access to garden and the remote double garage. Outside, a paved open air courtyard is framed by neatly landscaped borders, with a separate 'green zone' filled with fruit trees including cherry, peach, fig, apple, and more. Other fabulous features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, water tank, and quality blinds. With magpies warbling in this quiet leafy locale, you're just moments from East Ringwood shops and train, with easy access to Tintern Schools, parklands, Croydon central, and much more. Put this one straight to the top of your list!

Address: 16 Mountain Heath Walk CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Perfect for Your Growing Family
Within the leafy Gateway Estate, with its idyllic parks and walking trails, you'll feel like you are miles away from nowhere in this family-size home, set on a generous corner allotment of 672m2 (approx.) yet you're within easy reach of shops, schools and transport.
Beyond the cottage gardens and laced return verandah the double brick home reveals exceptionally spacious open plan living, accentuated by high cathedral ceilings, consisting of sunken lounge room, where you can entertain guests beside the open fire, dining and family area.
The Blackwood timber kitchen is centrally positioned so Mum can keep an eye on the kids while preparing the family meals.
Five bedrooms easily accommodate a growing family, supported by an ensuite with spa bath in the master bedroom and family-sized bathroom.
The covered pergola provides for large scale alfresco entertaining and theres plenty of yard for kids and pets.
With ducted heating, spilt-system air-conditioners and double garage with drive-thru, its the perfect home and environment for a growing family.

Address: 74-76 Long View Road CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Exclusive, Luxury Lifestyle With Grand Proportions
Enviably located on picturesque grounds amassing 3717m2 (approx) and only 2 years young, this stunning two storey residence offers generous proportions, beautiful interiors and provides all the elements for a relaxing, comfortable and modern lifestyle.
Showcasing exquisite quality appointments and a clever fusion of sleek and soothing materials, the well-executed floor plan delivers a superb interplay of light and space, coupled with an abundant use of glazing's that allows the landscaped gardens to take centre stage.
Constructed over three levels, the epicentre of the home is the open plan living zone; a sophisticated space incorporating the generously-sized family area where the rich warmth of the wooden flooring is balanced by the use of stainless steel appliances in the entertainer's kitchen, also comprising; stone bench tops, dishwasher and butler's pantry. The formal lounge, dining and meals provide additional living space for recreation, relaxing or entertaining.
The flawless integration of indoor/outdoor living has been masterfully handled, featuring a stylish alfresco via bi-fold doors, as well as two additional decks, taking full advantage of the garden views.
Catering to lifestyle convenience, the master suite is furnished in luxurious finishes; a well-proportioned walk-in robe with extensive wardrobe system, bi-fold doors opening out to the alfresco and sparkling en-suite with frameless shower screen, deep soak bath and twin vanities finished in Caesarstone, a theme echoed throughout, including a second bathroom to finish the ground level beautifully.
The upper level houses four large bedrooms with built-in robes, study, home theatre/rumpus and a stylish family bathroom boasting a separate bath and frameless shower, complete with a large arch window and vogue decor.
The floor plan is versatile, providing multi-generational or independent living accommodation, starting with the lower level featuring an open plan lounge and meals, bathroom and separate bedroom. The loft-style garage also doubles as a guest house, showcasing a master bedroom with built-in robe and full en-suite, second robed bedroom, and comfortable open plan living and balcony.
Busy executives will appreciate the large home office with adjoining powder room and abundant guest visitor parking, furthermore, this residence features an exhaustive list of inclusions, with highlights including; highly-functional laundry with cupboards, bench space and chute, built-in joinery throughout, data points, refrigerative ducted heating and cooling, multiple split system air-conditioning units, ducted vacuum, quality lighting including a hi-tech CEBus automation system, surround sound, ample storage, Rinnai Infinity hot water, two 13,500 litre water tanks, two garages accommodating up to eight vehicles, automatic gates, circular drive and rolling green lawns providing abundant space for children and pets.
Positioned only 30 minutes from Melbourne's CBD, the location affords a choice of premium schools, set within walking distance to Tinternvale Primary School, Tintern Girls Grammar School, kindergarten, local shopping precincts, bus stop, Ringwood East Railway Station, Cheong Park with playground and barbeque area and a short drive to EastLink.
Offering unparalleled grand-scale living, this exquisite residence offers a truly exceptional lifestyle.
Louise Carrigg : 0414827652
Insights: 74-76 Long View Road, CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Expressions of Interest Wednesday 19 March at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Stunning Contemporary Home
Follow the path via the pretty gardens and wide lawn to your beautifully renovated residence. Immaculately presented with 3 good-sized bedrooms, this home will tick all your boxes.
A large lounge room that wraps around to formal dining enjoys natural sunlight and comes complete with quality blinds to facilitate privacy. A galley-style kitchen perfectly positioned to entertain both inside and out is tailored with quality fittings and plenty of storage. An amazing modern bathroom including spa bath is the perfect place to unwind and relax, and is situated within easy access of all bedrooms.
The rear yard has been cleverly planned and is home to a wonderful alfresco paved area surrounded by bamboo fencing, keeping the outside world far from this retreat. Features include magnificent polished floor boards, hydronic heating, split system air-conditioning and single carport.
Positioned neatly on a corner block, close to Dorset and Bayswater North Primary School, Bayswater Secondary College, shops and transport.
* Beautifully renovated 3 bedroom home
* Large lounge flowing to a formal dining
* Kitchen with quality fittings and excellent storage
* Paved alfresco surrounded by bamboo fencing
* Modern bathroom with spa bath
* Close to Bayswater North Primary School, Bayswater Secondary College, shops and transport.
Terms 10% deposit, balance 30/45 days
Land: 505 sq m approx.

A wonderful home located in a well-established suburb that has everything done for you and your family, just move in and enjoy living. Call today for an inspection!

Description:
Luxurious Blend Of Quality, Size And Sophistication
Soaring and streamline, once constructed (expected completion date April 2014), this modern double storey townhouse will reflect everything that encompasses a contemporary, low maintenance lifestyle with quality appointments and a clever design concept that is set to impress even the most discerning investor, retiree, couple or family.
The interior exudes a fresh, contemporary feel with a fusion of warmth and charm, showcasing a welcoming front porch and tiled entry, and with light bursting through the large windows in the open plan living area, the occupants will be comfortable whether relaxing in the lounge, dining or preparing a meal in the stylish kitchen comprising stainless steel appliances with an electric oven, gas stove and dishwasher, as well as Caesarstone bench tops.
The layout is well planned, placing the master bedroom downstairs, which features a full ensuite and walk-in robe, while the additional robed bedrooms are zoned upstairs with a full sized bathroom and a second living zone with a family retreat or optional open study.
Promising an uncompromising list of inclusions, the home is finished with; gas central heating, split system air-conditioning, double glazed windows, Infinity gas hot water system, clothesline, 2000 litre water tank and panel-lift double garage with internal and pedestrian access to rear as well as a storage room.
Conveniently situated close to Merrindale Shopping Centre, bus stop, Eastfield Park, Dorset Primary School, Tintern Girls Grammar School and Swinburne Tafe, there's no better location to invest in your future.
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320

Address: 3 Briar Rose Walk CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Impressive Home, Tradie's Paradise!
Sale by Set Date 19/2/2014
This immaculate three bedroom home is situated in a serene estate of tree-lined streets and park lands, making this the ideal location to raise a family in blissfully quiet and harmonious surrounds. If you think the bay windows and landscaping work well together to create an impressive facade, you'll simply love the finishing touches waiting inside. The arresting master bedroom comprises built-in-robes with a stylish en-suite effect, whilst the other bedrooms are also serviced by built-in-robes with easy access to the bathroom also. The orange glow bounces off the lounge room walls when the Coonara is roaring, warming the entire home even through to the kitchen, which features abundant cupboard space, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and overlooks the meals area which opens out to a covered patio for outdoor entertaining. Outside is just as thoughtfully designed with all the little details taken care of. The laundry enjoys easy access to the clothesline and the large backyard provides the perfect place for a swing set and trampoline. Tradies will appreciate the double carport with pitched roof, four-car garage (fully lined and insulated) and the expansive drive providing an array of off-street parking - above and beyond the norm.
Other inclusions are; ducted heating, carpet, tiled wet areas, ceiling fans, split system air-conditioning, water tank (3000 ltr), awnings and front fence for added security.
If you're looking for a well-presented home with nothing else to do but relax, this is definitely the one you've been waiting for.
Proudly marketed by Barry Plant Real Estate Croydon
For further information contact Maree Slade 0419 519 282 or mslade@barryplant.com.au
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
A statement interior awaits behind the homely timber facade of this four bedroom family home.
Renovated and extended to capitalize on the 1/4 acre land size, there's plenty here to keep the wow factor flowing, starting with a formal retreat in the front lounge room that comes with a gas log fire and grand high ceilings for full luxury impact.
Hardwood floors guide the attention down the hall to the exquisite master bedroom and large en suite bathroom, with another bedroom, study and large powder room branching off from the front hall ways.
Opening out to an expansive casual living and entertaining space, the kitchen and family/meals zone has the perfect mix of light, traditional warmth and a connection between the indoors with the amazing covered deck and generous rear yard where kids can play until their heart's are content.
The marble impression on the bench tops are what highlights a luxurious element in the kitchen, whilst the stainless steel cooking appliances, a dishwasher and a double pantry make sure that function is not far behind.
The remaining two bedrooms and bathroom are privately tucked away for privacy, and with the inclusion of ducted heating, an air conditioner, single garage, single carport and ample off street parking available, this house just gets better and better....
Please Note: Sale of this property excludes cat run.

Description:
ELEGANT FAMILY HOME ON A BIG BLOCK
UNDER CONTRACT
A desirable location, which is set on a beautiful tree lined street that's moments to Croydon and Ringwood, this elegant home and gardens provide a high standard of living for your family. Approximately 1200m2 makes up the block, with established gardens and an attractive outdoor entertaining area to compliment the living zones inside. Expansive front windows allow the leafy green view to be a part of your every day in the lounge and dining room, whilst the casual retreat of the family and meals zone connects with the updated kitchen and has a full view of the backyard. Styled with Caesar stone and quality appliances, the heart of the home is ready for its next family to enjoy for years to come. The 3 bedrooms, en suite and family bathroom are positioned down the hall for privacy, whilst a huge home office/rumpus room and billiard room take possession of the lower level, opening up the potential to run a business from home, or provide a retreat for teens that has its own private access.
There's plenty of storage options throughout, as well as the inclusion of split system cooling, ducted heating, an oversized double carport and a couple of outdoor sheds.

Description:
Fine 1st Home & Darling Downsizer
In a private, leafy locale adjacent to parkland, this exceptionally low maintenance home offers bright and comfortable interiors and a serene setting. With a functional open plan design comprising a generous meals and lounge area overseen by a neat kitchen and a pergola-covered alfresco dining space and spa, it maximises on space while keeping the domains easy to manage. With all the work done for you, it holds vast appeal for first home buyers, downsizers and retirees.
Also features:
*Foxtel line connected; Cable internet to 3 rooms
*Climate control system. Gas heat & refrigerated AC (all rooms)
*3 beds, main with ensuite & WIR; BIRs; 3 toilets
*DLUG with toilet, bench top, sink & plenty of storage
*Moments to public transport & local shops
*Near to Dorset Primary & Tintern Grammar

Description:
LIVE, WORK & ENTERTAIN FROM HERE
This sizable corner property (863m2) offers many options for business owners who want to have work at their fingertips, or to have the flexibility and space to house tenants, guests or teens. Complete with a permit for a medical practice and its own entrance, the detached dwelling is spacious and comes with plenty of options to make full use of this added feature.
The home has a design element that is timeless and visually attractive whilst creating plenty of natural light that filters through the expanding doors that connect the interior to the beautiful paved courtyard and private garden setting.
Proportionate to the three bedrooms and two bathrooms, the living spaces include a family/meals area, a formal lounge with an open fire place and a well-appointed kitchen, all of which compliment the outdoor entertaining area and provide a lovely family environment to raise a family from.
Additional features include a video surveillance/security system, an alarm, reverse cycle heating/cooling and a remote double garage.

Description:
READY SET GO!
If you are a builder in search of your next project, a home buyer looking to invest or downsize, or even a first home buyer wanting to enter the property market, this fantastic block of land (approx. 500sqm) should be considered.
The plans offer a single storey dwelling with a great living/dining area and kitchen, separate lounge, separate toilet, laundry and internal access from the double lock up garage.
The home will also feature 3 Spacious bedrooms with built in robes, the master with walk in robe and full ensuite, 2nd bathroom and nice alfresco entertaining area, all proposed for a half block only moments away from everything Croydon South Shopping Centre has to offer.
Please don't hesitate to call to discuss this great opportunity and the potential stamp duty and first home buyer savings that may be available to you. We also have plenty of highly qualified builders we can recommend to assist you in building your dream home.

Description:
Charming Character home on a family sized allotment!
Perfectly positioned close to Ringwood East in a quiet location, this charming 3 bedroom home with character and street appeal offers views to the Dandenong Ranges.
This well maintained home combines a functional floorplan with abundant natural light and a fresh and friendly vibe. The opportunity awaits a new buyer to further update or sit back and relax in this comfortable home. Comprising of two living areas and a striking kitchen/meals area the home is further complimented by an alfresco deck surrounded by lush greenery and a front deck that boasts stunning views.
As an added feature a large fully insulated workshop is currently utilised for a home business, with a kitchenette and powder room the possibilities are endless.
In a family friendly locale within walking distance of shops, public transport and offering easy access to Ringwood, Eastlink and Eastland call today before another savvy buyer snaps up this opportunity!

Description:
Light And Fresh With Modern Touches
Light and fresh are two words that come to mind as soon as you step foot in the door of this charming home, showcasing crisp, white walls and polished hardwood floors creating an impressive, contemporary feel throughout, with touches of modern allure that are sure to keep you comfortable.
The brand new kitchen is well equipped, featuring a stainless steel gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher and finished with timeless white cabinetry, catering beautifully for your entertaining needs and located adjacent to an intimate meals area, only steps from the lounge where relaxing is made easy, as well as the outdoor entertaining area overlooking the secure courtyard.
The generous-sized bedrooms are located off a hallway, with convenient access to the family bathroom comprising a separate bath and shower, with one bedroom containing exterior access to the decking, furthermore, the second bedroom and master contain built-in robes.
Adding further value to the home, creature comforts include; large linen press, gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, water tank, carport and sizable front lawn tucked behind a fence, adding to the available outdoor space.
Boasting street frontage and with only two homes on the block, this solid, brick veneer, triple-fronted home is located within easy walking distance to Eastfield Park, Merrindale Shopping Centre, Dorset Primary School, Croydon Special Developmental School, as well as Eastland and EastLink only a short drive away.
Whether you're a first-home buyer, investor or looking to downsize, this relaxing, low-maintenance residence has everything you need to guarantee a bright future.
Geoff Thompson

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Looking for your next big project without compromising on convenience? With an outstanding location like this there is scope to redevelop, rebuild, or subdivide (STCA) - and whichever option you choose, the rewards will follow. Situated at the end of a quiet court on an impressive 1507m2 (approx.), the mature allotment is currently the site of a 1960's home that has had only 1 owner in its lifetime. Accommodation includes 3 bedrooms, bathroom/laundry, original kitchen, and lounge. The allotment creates a sense of peace and privacy, with birdsong aplenty. Only a stone's throw from Tintern Grammar School, this highly desirable location is also close to bus, East Ringwood train station, Eastfield Shops, parks, schools, Eastland and Eastlink. Inspect today and consider the possibilities!
Insights: 4 Bridge Court, Croydon South VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 48 other 3 bedroom house in Croydon South have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Family Living
*WHAT A GREAT CHRISTMAS PRESENT* Private Inspections Welcome
If you're a Family, Investor or First Homebuyer, you must put this spacious young 3 bedroom 2 bathroom retreat on your wish list. It's privately set in a tranquil cul-de-sac, is refreshed and ready for you. A bay window and pretty landscaped garden will pull at your heart strings. The stylish, light-filled interior is freshly painted and feels good with its timber flooring, new contemporary carpets and new window furnishings. Three living areas (ceiling fans) and a modern kitchen featuring s/s appliances will make family life an absolute delight. For casual living and entertaining take your pick from the stylish lounge room, the spacious dining/meals area or the large family room. The private master boasts updated ensuite, ceiling fan and WIR, while the children's bedrooms (double size, with BIRs) and family bathroom are zoned in their own wing. A big entertaining area is ideal for your barbeques, and children will love the cubby and gorgeous landscaped garden, which is secure and practical. Appointments: ducted heating, big split system air-conditioner, alarm and x-large garage with workshop. Superbly sited; walk to Tinternvale Primary, bus, Eastfield Mall shops and reserves; handy to EastLink. Vendor Says Sell!!

Description:
Escape To Your Own Private Garden Oasis
This quiet and ideally positioned, sun drenched home is located at the end of a circular drive, within a secure and sought after cul-de-sac community occupying a 668m2 (approx) allotment of picturesque, park like gardens, relished from the full length verandah and spacious, covered outdoor entertaining area.
With an interior enveloped in warmth and comfort, floating floors ensure a sense of free flowing connectivity from the resplendent lounge through to the family/meals, serviced by a fully equipped timber kitchen enhanced by a stainless steel gas stove, electric oven and dishwasher.
This solid, three bedroom residence comprises a master with walk-in robe and full ensuite, and a well maintained bathroom, easily accessed from the additional two bedrooms, furthermore, the home also boasts gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, down lights, tiled laundry, shed, double carport with roller door entry and ample parking for guests.
Located for convenience, access nearby amenities easily with; bus, Eastfield Shopping Centre, Tinternvale Primary School and Tintern Girls Grammar School close by.
Whether you're a retiree, family, investor or looking to downsize, we welcome you to inspect this superb property boasting fantastic practicality and privacy in a brilliant location.
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320
Insights: 10/27 Central Avenue, CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
LIVE IN OR INVEST
Certain to spark the interest from new comers to the property market, investors and buyers wanting minimal property maintenance, this three bedroom home has all the right elements that make it ideal.
A location boasting easy access to Croydon Main Street, Eastfield shops, Eastfield Park and a short walk or commute to schools that include Tintern, the home itself is equally appealing.
Beginning with a generous front yard with street appeal, the interior is lined with functional hardwood floors, a spotless bathroom, a lounge room with a gas log fire, kitchen/meals zone, as well as reverse cycle heating/cooling.
Whether you're looking to owner occupy the residence or think of it as a business opportunity for investment purposes (currently leased at $325 p/w on a month to month basis), there's potential at either end of the scale.
Features: Single garage
